mapper.select:
select pa.row_id as assetId , pa.serialnumber as vin , pa.enginenumber__c as engineNumber , pa.carregistrationnumber__c as licenseNumber , pa.renavam_code__c as renavamCode , pa.fsc__c as fscOcn , pa.description as description , pa.manufacturedate as manufactureYear , pa.modelyear__c as modelYear , (select val from process.color_information ci where "type"= 'AUTO_INTERIOR' and lang_id__c= 'ENU' and name_code = pa.vehicleinternalcolor__c limit 1) as internalColorCode , (select val from process.color_information ci2 where "type"='AUTO_EXTERIOR' and lang_id__c= 'ENU' and name_code = pa.vehiclecolor__c limit 1) as externalColorCode , pa.carregistrationnumber__c as vehicleLicenseNumber , pa.fueltype__c as fuel , pa.status as status -- , TO_CHAR(pa.dealer_rcpt_dt__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as saleToDealerDate , case when pa.dealer_rcpt_dt__c notnull then to_char(pa.dealer_rcpt_dt__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') end as saleToDealerDate -- , TO_CHAR(pa.billing_date__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as billingDate , case when pa.billing_date__c notnull then to_char(pa.billing_date__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') end as billingDate , pa.cf_eval_svc_cd__c as ccsFlg -- , TO_CHAR(pa.warranty_start_dt__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') as warrantyStartDate , case when pa.warranty_start_dt__c notnull then to_char(pa.warranty_start_dt__c,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS-0300') end as warrantyStartDate , pa.purch_loc_desc__c as fiscalReceipt , (select row_id from process.account where dealercode__c = pa.dealercode__c limit 1) as dealerId , pa.dealercode__c as dealerCode , (select "name" from process.account where dealercode__c = pa.dealercode__c limit 1) as dealerName , (select corporaterepresentativename__c from process.account where dealercode__c = pa.dealercode__c limit 1) as dealerNickname , a2.firstname || ' ' || a2.lastname as salesManName , pp.chassi_model__c as model , pa.oper_status_cd__c as negotiationType , pa.dlr_con_int_id__c as salesManId , pa.fsc__c as fsc_ocn , pa.latestmileage__c as mileage , a3.row_id as AccountSearchId , a2.row_id as contactSearchId from process.asset pa left join process.customer_vehicle ac on pa.row_id = ac.asset_id and ac.status_cd = 'Active' left join process.account a2 on ac.account_id = a2.row_id and ac.cv_type = 'Person' left join process.account a3 on ac.account_id = a3.row_id and ac.cv_type = 'Business' left join process.product pp on pa.product2id = pp.row_id where
pa.serialnumber = #{serialNumber} limit 1
pa.carregistrationnumber__c = #{licenseNumber} limit 1
pa.renavam_code__c = #{renavamCode}
a2.cpf__c = #{cpf}
a3.corporateregistrationnumber__c = #{cnpj}
pa.billing_date__c between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.row_id = #{connexid} limit 1
pa.billing_date__c between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.billing_date__c between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.billing_date__c = to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.serialnumber like concat('%',#{serialNumber})
pa.billing_date__c between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a3.dealercode__c = #{dealerCode} limit 1

select pc.row_id as id , pc.integrationId as integrationId , pc.firstname as firstName , pc.lastname as lastName , pc.personbirthdate as birthDate , pc.cpf__c as document , pc.gender__pc as sex , pc."type" as personType , cc.mailingpostalcode as postalCode , cc.mailingstreet as street , cc.mailingstreet_2__c as number , cc.mailingstreet_3__c as complement , cc.mailingcountry as county , cc.mailingcity as city , cc.mailingstate as state , pc.personhomephone as homePhone , pc.companyphone__pc as workPhone , pc.personmobilephone as cellPhone , pc.personemail as emailAddress , pac.relation_type_cd as relationshipType , pac.status_cd as relationshipStatus from process.account pc join process.contact cc on pc.row_id = cc.account_row_id join process.customer_vehicle pac on pc.row_id = pac.account_id join process.asset pa on pa.row_id = pac.asset_id where pc.row_id = #{contactInputId} and pa.row_id = #{assetInputId}

select pc.row_id as id , pc.integrationId as integrationId , pc.corporateregistrationnumber__c as cnpj , pc.name as name , pc.corporaterepresentativename__c as nickname , pc.type as personType , pc.billingpostalcode as zipCode , pc.billingstreet as streetAddress , pc.billingstreet_2__c as streetAddress2 , pc.billingstreet_3__c as streetAddress3 , pc.billingcity as city , pc.billingstate as state , pc.billingcountry as neighborhood , pc.phone as mainPhone , pc.fax as fax , pc.emailaddress__c as mainEmailAddress , paa.relation_type_cd as relationshipType , paa.status_cd as relationshipStatus from process.account pc join process.customer_vehicle paa on pc.row_id = paa.account_id join process.asset pa on paa.asset_id = pa.row_id where pc.row_id = #{accountInputId} and pa.row_id = #{assetInputId}
